column4: Cypher...I don't mean to interrupt...I have a xubuntu question
would you know by chance how to make panels reappear?
i had 3, removed 1 and they all disappeared
hmm..says failed to execute child process
might be something stuck, killall xfce4-panel and try starting it up again
are there any dashes or anything to type along with the command?
is this a persistent issue ? i mean, do you get the panels back after a logout/login ?
